greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The sum of the primes <= n that are strongly prime to n.
comment: k is strongly prime to n iff k is relatively prime to n and k does not divide n-1.
maple: A181835 := proc(n) local i; add(i,i=StrongCoprimePrimes(n)) end:
mathematica: a[n_] := Select[Range[2, n], PrimeQ[#] && CoprimeQ[#, n] && !Divisible[n-1, #] &] // Total; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 47}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 28 2013 *)
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Nov 17 2010
